Reviews.Title: Love this little camera
Reviews.Author: S. Williams
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my sister as a christmas gift, I myself loved the colour and the brand.  She loved how easy it is to use

ProductInfo.Features:
6 Megapixel, up to 2816x2112 resolution, 640x480 at 30 fps - We recommend purchasing an optional 2GB SD Memory Card for practical usage
Image Sensor Type - 1/2.5-inch CCD
2.5-inch color TFT 150K LCD Monitor
Shooting - Single, Continuous and AEB
Self-timer - 2 & 10 seconds, Double
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S630 Point and Shoot 6 Megapixel Digital Camera - Pink
